summary: Narrated by Lily Tomlin, this documentary short traces mankind's long history with elephants and explores the many problems that arise when they are brought to live in captivity in zoos and circuses.
cast: Lily Tomlin|Pat Derby|Colleen Kinzley|Jeff Kinzley|Ross MacPhee|Rose McCoy|Cynthia Moss|Joel Parrott|Katy Payne|Joyce Poole|Mel Richardson|Ed Stewart
title: Una disculpa a los elefantes
